reviews.review_msg: Ive taken 2 classes with Jody and he is great ! Cares a lot about his students and always offers help and guidance. His classes are not hard as long as you read and pay attention to what he says in lecture. If you listen to what he says and write everything down you will be fine on any of his assignments .

There's not much to be said about Jody that hasn't been said already. If you get the chance to take a class with him, do it. He's so passionate about his topic and 323W is relatively straightforward in terms of assignments- one term paper and one group video project. No final. Lectures aren't mandatory either, but go to them! They're interesting.

I took this class due to all the raves for the professor and ended up extremely disappointed. His long tangents, constant stumbling and referring to his notes, and over-arching sense that he himself was unprepared for class really hit home. I would not recommend this prof to anyone. I ended up learning much more in tutorial then through him.
